title: Star anise chocolate fondant with orange ice cream
description: Add some spice to traditional chocolate fondants with star anise. Seve with orange cream for a wonderfully fragrant dessert.
ingredients: 55g/2oz butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
135g/4½oz dark chocolate (minimum 70% cocoa solids), chopped, plus 40g/1½oz, grated
¾ tsp freshly ground star anise
